title: Redeem a Gift Card
description: A customer wants to apply a gift card to their purchase during checkout.

tasks.description: Take the gift card code from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the gift card code.

tasks.description: Validate the gift card code and check its balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the gift card is valid and has a balance of $50.

tasks.description: Apply the gift card balance to the order total.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully discounts the order total by $50.
